title: VR-Based Social Problem-Solving Simulation Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in VR environments to experience real-world social issues and derive solutions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social issues presented in a VR environment and explain three or more core causes.
Learners can design solutions to social problems using VR simulation tools and complete team-based prototype implementations.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of designed solutions through a VR-based assessment system using quantitative data (engagement rate over 80%, goal achievement rate over 70%).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
